skillTree.localised_description: Those facing a great challenge, a difficult decision, or simply in need of luck, may call upon the Goddess of Dreams and Fortune.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
His presence is a reassuring one for the rest of the army, for as long as he is alive, they know victory will surely be theirs.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Althran has come to value Caladris' expert advice as much as his magical abilities - especially on matters that pertain to the mystical and the arcane.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.localised_description: Spells using Qhaysh use elements of many or all the Winds of Magic at once.
Aided by his Channeling Staff, Caladris is fully capable of deflecting an enemy's magical abilities.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕Enemy casters within range suffer minor miscast explosion when casting

skillTree.localised_description: Before a battle, Caladris will spend many long hours studying ancient texts, preparing for the ordeal ahead.

ui_effects.localised_text: Grants one of the listed effects at random

attributes.bullet_text: A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.
This unit is unable to activate abilities or cast spells.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
If this unit can hide at its current location it will not be spotted until the enemy is very close.

skillTree.localised_description: Caladris has a natural affinity for the art of sorcery and an ability to manipulate the Winds of Magic. This, combined with decades of tutelage under the Archmages of the fabled White Tower, have made Caladris a powerful Mage.

effects.description: Enable "Student of The White Tower" passive

skillTree.localised_description: The mage is born aloft by the tempestuous winds of magic now under his control.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Caladris is capable of immolating entire regiments of warriors with but a glance.

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Clouds darken and the wizard conjures forth a powerful bolt of lightning from the grey skies.
All around the caster, High Elves recall the glory of Aenarion and fight on with courage.
Calling upon the dread might of Khaine, the Elven god of war and murder, the mage launches a searing bolt of brilliant white energy at his enemies.

Pure white flames emerge from the air itself and envelop the target, immolating the unworthy foe. With every passing second the flames grow hotter, swiftly intensifying until they can sear flesh or even melt steel.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
An good weapon is never redundant, even for a wizard of such stature.

enabled_if: Winds of magic power is 15 or greater
Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The mage is surrounded by a glimmering sphere that hardens in response to physical contact.
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: Aided by his Channeling Staff, Caladris is fully capable of deflecting an enemy's magical abilities.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10

ui_effects.localised_text: ➕Enemy casters within range suffer minor miscast explosion when casting

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The mage saved the prince from being torn apart by a pack of Trolls, engulfing the beasts with fiery blasts of magic. Since that time the two have forged a bond of friendship.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle
